Systems at Lopez Wealth Management my central role is to provide day to day technical support of all hardware and networking devices and troubleshoot enduser issues and questions Acquisition operation of all computer systems Including comprehensive database management and migration from SQL to Oracle As well as Comprehensive software management and migration from QuickBooks to QS1 As
